mapper.select: SELECT id, dts_id, state, user_name, description, created_time, updated_time FROM tbl_dts_detail WHERE dts_id = #{dtsId} ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dts_detail (dts_id, state, user_name, description, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{dtsId}, #{state}, #{userName}, #{description}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
